channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: I have reported this before, 14th April
item.description:
I have reported this before there are far too many potholes to mention they are all over Salamanca Road, you are zig zagging to avoid them the whole road, and they are getting bigger and more of them it is a complete mess trying to drive here especially with all the parked cars to avoid, you told me they did not need doing so I ask you to please take another look
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Salamanca Road, Oakley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Exposed Rubbish, 14th April
item.description:
Despite previous efforts to remove excess rubbish, fix doors and add a combination lock, the problem has returned! Rubbish bags being dumped without care, doors left unlocked, thus presenting a health hazard to residents and passers-by. This has accumulated over the course of several months. Location - directly next to pedestrian cut-through at back of Greenways, leading into Barnett Way.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greenways, Barnwood, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain in Alexandra Street, 13th April
item.description:
The drain outside number 25 Alexandra Street is completely blocked with vegetation and soil/grit. This was reported in September, last year, (ref 6444575) and it has since become even more compacted.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Alexandra Street, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple flyposters attached to hedgerows, 13th April
item.description:
Event notice posters attached by plastic ties along several hundred metres of hedgerow. The event passed weeks ago and the posters have not been removed. They are now littering the hedgerows. The culprit? probably either Cheltenham Borough Council licencing committee, Prestbury Parish Council or Southam Parish Council. Why have the persons who erected dozens of the same notices, not removed them ?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
